title: 'I thought I was going to die': Pensioner savaged by 'pit bull-type' dog in bloodbath tells of her terror
summary:
Sign up for our daily newsletter to get the day's biggest stories sent direct to your inboxA pensioner who was savaged by a 'pit bull-type' dog has told how she feared she was about to die.
David must have heard me screaming because he rushed out and dived on it, pinning it to the floor."
A warning sign on the owner’s gate said 'Beware of dogs'.
I am an animal lover but with this dog I would have to say put it down.
The doctors told me it would take a year for the injuries in my head to heal."
